msbt.message: I'm pretty excited for the Fishing Tourney today. How about you?I'm gonna meet lots of fish today. Oh! Maybe I'll find a new favorite fish! Probably not. But maybe!
The more fish ya catch, the more points you score. Doesn't even matter what kinda fish!I'm gonna catch so many fish that C.J. goes, "splash!"

Have fun at the Fishing Tourney today, OK? This is your chance to be real zen and chill for a whole day.Don't freak out if you see the shadow of a big fishy.No matter how big or how small, you catch all the fishies the same way. So just be chill, !
Ya get points for every fish ya catch today. But they gotta be new fish caught today.They can't be old fish you've got sitting on a shelf in your house.
You want in on the Fishing Tourney? Go say hey to C.J. in the clearing over there. He's a real cool dude.
